component.author: U.S. Air Force
component.summary_s: Secretary of the Air Force Deborah Lee James presents the artist rendering of the B-21 during her "State of the Force" presentation during Air Force Association's Air Warfare Symposium in Orlando, Fla., Feb. 26, 2016.
